mapper.select: select ES_COUPLING_ID, ES_COUPLING_NAME from T_ES_COUPLING where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND IS_EFFECTIVE=1 AND ES_COUPLING_STATUS=3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, T .* FROM "AMPC"."T_ES_COUPLING" T WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by ES_COUPLING_ID DESC ) WHERE rn >= #{startTotal,jdbcType=OTHER} AND rn <= #{endTotal,jdbcType=OTHER}

mapper.update: UPDATE T_ES_COUPLING SET ES_COUPLING_STATUS = 3 WHERE ES_COUPLING_ID = #{esCouplingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
